{"id":757986325,"question_id":202,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1658913797,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"71 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/757986325/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"43.8 MB","code":"\n/**\n * \n * @param {number} n \n * @returns {number}\n */\nfunction sumOfSquared(n) {\n  let nums = [...`${n}`];\n  nums = nums.map((num) => num ** 2); \n  return nums.reduce((prev, curr) => prev + curr);\n}\n\n/**\n * @param {number} n\n * @return {boolean}\n */\nfunction isHappy(n) {\n  let set = new Set();\n\n  while (n !== 1 && !set.has(n)) {\n    set.add(n);\n    n = sumOfSquared(n);\n  }\n\n  return n === 1;\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
